name: Ft_header
description:
Simple plugin for adding 42 school header to C source and header files.

Getting started

All you have to do is save your file, the plugin will either add the header if it does not exist or update the current one.

You have the ability to customize the files you want to target, and also provide your email and login using the IDE settings via (Settings -> Tools -> 42 Header Settings).
notes:
• Make plugin compatible with CLion 2023.2.
  • Adding more logs for easier debugging.
